content.rendered:
A down-on-his-luck basketball coach (Adam Sandler) discovers an extremely talented but down-and-out player and does everything to bring him to the States without his team’s permission. They have one last chance to prove they have what it takes to be among the best.

Directed By Jeremiah Zagar

Writers: Taylor Materne. Will Fetters

Stars: Adam Sandler. Queen Latifah. Juancho Hernangomez
